satellite_topology_construction_algorithms.plus_grid module¶

satellite_topology_construction_algorithms.plus_grid.generate_plus_grid_isls(output_filename_isls, n_orbits, n_sats_per_orbit, isl_shift, idx_offset=0)[source]¶

Generate plus grid ISL file. This code (from Hypatia) generates a +Grid topology for a given satellite network (it assumes that each satellite has 4 ISL terminals).

:param output_filename_isls Output filename :param n_orbits: Number of orbits :param n_sats_per_orbit: Number of satellites per orbit :param isl_shift: ISL shift between orbits (e.g., if satellite id in orbit is X,

does it also connect to the satellite at X in the adjacent orbit)

Parameters

idx_offset – Index offset (e.g., if you have multiple shells)

LEO_Satellite_Network_Topology_Design
